title: Peace With Your Scars | Joel Osteen
itunes:title: Peace With Your Scars | Joel Osteen
description:
You don't have to live ashamed of what you've been through. God wants to redeem every past hurt in your life.


Your best days are still ahead, and together we can make a difference in this world with the message of God's hope and love.

To give visit JoelOsteen.com/GiveHope

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
